name: GoBo - Desert of Cubes
description:
Gobo and the Desert of Cubes is a side-scrolling 2D puzzle platformer.

Reign terror on small monsters, activate magical boxes and carve your path to that mystical door to help GoBo reach the exit door and escape the Desert!

Do you think you have what it takes? Don't let the beginning levels trick you it’s going to be easy, your skills will be put to the test!
.................................................................................................................................................

GoBo was created by a small team of developers as a passion project. We hope you like the game, we’ve poured a lot of love into creating it. Let us know what you think!

To see more artworks from the game, click  here

If you like the game, feel free to buy us a coffee, any amount of donation is much appreciated.

Have a nice day!

.................................................................................................................................................
